title: INTENSE WW1 DESERT BATTLE - The Great War Total War Mod Gameplay
description:
The Great War Total War Mod Gameplay - We are back in WW1 and Sweden is advancing on German defenses.  What we are about to witness is a bloody battle of sand and valor!  Enjoy the Battle :D


If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
